reviewText: As a part-time golfer, the short game seems the hardest to conquer -- conquer - who am I kidding!  Let's say the hardest to perform well consistently. Since watching this video and putting the many well-rendered tips to practice, I have seen a distinct and exciting improvement in my short game.  The video is clear, well-produced, user friendly, and at times funny.  Very entertaining and helpful! Heath and ShowMeHow Videos did a great job.
